thread.section_title: Bravofly.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bravofly.com | www.bravofly.com
thread.title: Pavel Buhtin

author: Pavel Buhtin
title: Pavel Buhtin
text:
customer support is amazing,never have been supported so rudely and unprofessionally.I booked a work trip,when it came to sending receipt to accountant,I see that they didnt send anything.How is that even legal?
I called support,was ensured that i will get email.
After 2 days,no receipt was sent to me.
I call again,and just amazing,I hear just i dont know anything i dont care. Blamed me that i have to read rules and i dont know how to book tickets.
Never met that bad service.
